job.title: (USA) Principal Software Engineer - Capacity and Cost Modeling
job.description: About The TeamPosition Summary... You will be acting as a team lead for data analysts focused on workload classification, cloud computing, predictive modeling, and customer outreach.The ideal candidate will be an individual who has had experience developing and supporting complex data models at scale, and who can communicate nuance assumptions and data models to several levels of executive management.Youâll sweep us off our
